content.story: Meet Alex, a curious teen who loves sharing moments online. One day, Alex realizes that a silly post from two years ago is still visible to everyone. This makes Alex wonder: 'What kind of digital footprint am I creating?'

components.title: Do's and Don'ts of Posting Online

cards.back: DO: Ask yourself - Would I be comfortable if my teacher, family, or future employer saw this?
DON'T: Avoid posting your full name, address, phone number, or school details publicly.
DO: Regularly check and update your privacy settings on all social media platforms.
DON'T: Wait until you're calm before posting something when you're angry or upset.

data.question: Why is it important to manage your online persona?
options: Because it determines who can see your posts
Because it affects how others perceive you in the long term
Because it can help secure your personal information
data.explanation: Managing your online persona affects your privacy, security, and reputation.
